hero.headline: Professional Garden & Grounds Maintenance
hero.subheadline: Reliable, fully insured experts in garden care, hedge trimming, tree removal and more — serving landlords, agents, and homeowners.

about.title: About ASD Gardens
about.description: ASD Gardens is an established, reputable firm delivering high-quality grounds maintenance and property care services. We work with landlords, estate agents, and homeowners across the region, offering everything from regular grass cutting to full-scale garden clearances. Our team includes experienced in-house gardeners and trusted subcontractors, all fully insured and qualified in their trade.

items.title: Grass Cutting & Lawn Care
items.description: Scheduled and one-off lawn mowing, edging, weeding, fertilising and seasonal treatments for healthy green spaces.

items.title: Hedge Trimming & Shaping
items.description: Precision trimming and reshaping of hedges and shrubs to maintain neat boundaries and tidy gardens.

items.title: Tree & Stump Removal
items.description: Safe and efficient felling, pruning, and stump grinding by qualified arborists.

items.title: Garden Waste Removal
items.description: We'll clear and dispose of green waste, overgrowth, and unwanted garden items responsibly and legally.

items.title: Jet Washing & Hard Surface Cleaning
items.description: Driveway, patio, and decking jet wash services to restore the look of outdoor surfaces.

items.title: Landlord & Lettings Support
items.description: End-of-tenancy garden clearances, ongoing maintenance, and pre-let property tidy-ups tailored to estate agents and landlords.

items.title: Fully Insured & Qualified
items.description: Peace of mind with a professional team backed by full insurance and verified training.

items.title: Trusted by Landlords
items.description: We work closely with letting agents and landlords to deliver prompt, reliable property maintenance.

items.title: Eco-Friendly Disposal
items.description: Green waste is disposed of responsibly, recycling where possible and following local environmental guidelines.

quotes.name: Lettings Agent Partner
quotes.quote: ASD Gardens have transformed the outdoor spaces on multiple properties we manage. They're fast, tidy, and always professional.

quotes.name: Private Homeowner
quotes.quote: I use them every month for lawn care and hedge trimming. Great service, fair prices, and super friendly staff.

items.question: Do you offer regular maintenance contracts?
items.answer: Yes — we offer weekly, fortnightly, or monthly visits depending on your needs.

items.question: Are you fully insured?
items.answer: Absolutely — all our team members are covered with public liability insurance and are professionally trained.

items.question: Do you cover commercial properties?
items.answer: Yes — we maintain both residential and commercial outdoor spaces.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Contact us for a no-obligation quote or to discuss your garden or property maintenance needs.
